channel.title: Requests
channel.description:
well, i looked around the tut forum, and also checked old tuts.. but i really cant find them :P i can find tele block, and hold timers,, but all for pimpscape source.. so here r some requist, so if you maybe find a link once, u can post it here :) All for testscape source i need: #1 working teleblock (also for commands) #2 working hold times, for entangle, ice barrage and more of those :P #3 how to remove wild skull? since i got upper top text, it does wierd things when in wildernis. #4 fix that 135 of the 99 and make it 135 of the 135, and 1 of the 1. (also change colors :P)
now im posting anyway i can even post my features to :P #5 working duel arena and castlewars :eek: #6 Dont eat your weapon when you click fast on ur food.. (so ingoing :P) #7 final, but not last :P how to remove wild lvls, and put pk mode on/off :) so if you find one, or know the code :| Post here :D [br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 09:27:41 AM[/size][hr]i really cant find those since the mopar search button is really ffk up.. i really need ur help ppl![br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 01:52:30 PM[/size][hr]some1 gonna help me? :eek:

stop triple posting… i reported to mod…

item.title: Requests
item.dc:creator: @Roderick50 Roderick50
item.description:
@Roderick50 wrote:

well, i looked around the tut forum, and also checked old tuts…
but i really cant find them i can find tele block, and hold timers, but all for pimpscape source…
so here r some requist, so if you maybe find a link once, u can post it here
All for testscape source
i need:
#1 working teleblock (also for commands)
#2 working hold times, for entangle, ice barrage and more of those
#3 how to remove wild skull? since i got upper top text, it does wierd things when in wildernis.
#4 fix that 135 of the 99 and make it 135 of the 135, and 1 of the 1. (also change colors :P)

now im posting anyway i can even post my features to
#5 working duel arena and castlewars :eek:
#6 Dont eat your weapon when you click fast on ur food… (so ingoing :P)
#7 final, but not last how to remove wild lvls, and put pk mode on/off
so if you find one, or know the code Post here
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 09:27:41 AM[/size][hr]i really cant find those since the mopar search button is really ffk up…
i really need ur help ppl![br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 01:52:30 PM[/size][hr]some1 gonna help me? :eek:
